comments:

*** Bug 186408 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

From the javadoc

Returns:
    An array of abstract pathnames denoting the files and directories in the directory denoted by this abstract pathname. The array will be empty if the directory is empty. Returns null if this abstract pathname does not denote a directory, or if an I/O error occurs.

The fix is trivial so it should go into 3.3. Karice can you check my patch please? I suspect there are I/O errors that are causing this to be null sometimes.
I was getting this same error on Linux.  Does this fix also apply to the Linux platform?
This problem (and the fix) is on all platforms
Verified by code inspection in I20070517-0010
